# Blitz Player

A command-line interface (CLI) tool to play music from YouTube Music.

## Installation

```bash
pip install blitz-player
```

## Usage

To play a song, use the following command:

```bash
bp Song name to play here
```

## Controls

- `p`: Play/Pause
- `n`: Next Song
- `b`: Previous Song
- `l`: Toggle Loop (On/Off)
- `q`: Quit
